he043b9f9gfc52g4c39ga4f1gc53ea4fcd5ce.ReferenceText:
Add skill IDs to this setting to blacklist them from being animation-cancelled.
Only affects skills used by the player.
he043b9f9gfc52g4c39ga4f1gc53ea4fcd5ce.TranslatedText: 添加不需要取消动作的技能ID

h8277c4cdg8990g406fga0b5gef3f0d386620.ReferenceText: If enabled, the animation for picking up items through their world tooltip will be cancelled, allowing multiple items to be picked up faster.
h8277c4cdg8990g406fga0b5gef3f0d386620.TranslatedText: 启用后, 通过环境提示拾取物品的动画将被取消. 从而可以更快地拾取多个物品

he5c3a752gd8bag48fagb611g35b5d23bef9d.ReferenceText: If enabled, your controlled character's skill animations will be cancelled after their effects execute, allowing you to perform consecutive actions quicker.
he5c3a752gd8bag48fagb611g35b5d23bef9d.TranslatedText: 技能效果发生后, 取消角色后续施法动作, 这样动作可以连贯, 目的是加快回合速度

hf832b7ceg2e16g454dg8b5cg2ac87a0f7681.ReferenceText: Speed up world tooltip item pick-ups
hf832b7ceg2e16g454dg8b5cg2ac87a0f7681.TranslatedText: 加快环境提示中的物品拾取

he085d18bge863g4bf2ga811g562dcc358d76.ReferenceText: Shows B/H amounts over the heads of characters in combat.
he085d18bge863g4bf2ga811g562dcc358d76.TranslatedText:
战斗中, 角色头上显示重创/蹂躏数值
只适用于史诗遭遇mod

h9f5438ffg5024g4264gaaa2gef122c54e518.ReferenceText: Are you sure you want to start a new game?
h9f5438ffg5024g4264gaaa2gef122c54e518.TranslatedText: 你确定要开始新游戏吗?

h1b460fc0ge72dg4879g9886g1dc640a782cb.ReferenceText: No more valid moves on the board!
h1b460fc0ge72dg4879g9886g1dc640a782cb.TranslatedText: 棋差一着, 满盘皆输

hec25a517g9521g47e3g8f74gfa658861a320.ReferenceText:
Controls the FOV of the camera. Low/high values may cause issues with dynamic shadows.
Default is 45.
hec25a517g9521g47e3g8f74gfa658861a320.TranslatedText:
镜头视野. 过高或过低可能会导致动态阴影出问题
默认45

h97ac5f1fg0ae8g490dg9050gb5f8fe4025a4.ReferenceText:
Controls the maximum distance the camera can zoom out in controller mode.
Default is 13.
h97ac5f1fg0ae8g490dg9050gb5f8fe4025a4.TranslatedText:
手柄模式最大收缩距离
默认13

h8403161cgb78fg453fg9676gd4c14f3afd29.ReferenceText:
Controls the maximum distance the camera can zoom out in regular gameplay.
Default is 19.
h8403161cgb78fg453fg9676gd4c14f3afd29.TranslatedText:
在通常镜头模式下, 镜头的最大收缩距离
默认19

h22447dfage02dg4c93gbf2agded54810ce36.ReferenceText:
Controls the maximum distance the camera can zoom out in tactical view mode.
Default is 25.
h22447dfage02dg4c93gbf2agded54810ce36.TranslatedText:
战术视角镜头最大缩小距离
默认是25.

h3af2fabcg24ffg4e29ga965g69180c641040.ReferenceText:
Controls the maximum distance the camera can zoom out while it is tracking an entity.
Default is 17.
h3af2fabcg24ffg4e29ga965g69180c641040.TranslatedText:
跟踪一个实体时, 镜头的最大缩小距离
默认17

h24797af2gde0ag48cdgb741gec2049e1c631.ReferenceText: Restores the angle settings to default values.

h1900a04ag7611g4d34g8975g89a0dac84c56.TranslatedText: 显示所有史诗遭遇mod中的神器

hde789445g157eg4ecbg962bg1cb03cdfdc80.ReferenceText: View all sort of information from enabled mods.
hde789445g157eg4ecbg962bg1cb03cdfdc80.TranslatedText: 从mod中查看整理好的信息

hcf8d7869gc200g463bgb0dbg81c686990462.ReferenceText: Determines the position of skill tooltips within the UI.
hcf8d7869gc200g463bgb0dbg81c686990462.TranslatedText: 界面里技能提示的位置

hac78ff60gededg498agbb7eg97795fcd40fc.ReferenceText: Copies the cursor's world position to clipboard.
hac78ff60gededg498agbb7eg97795fcd40fc.TranslatedText: 将光标的世界位置复制到剪贴板

h5efb42cag481bg466dg9089g55793976612a.ReferenceText: Determines the maximum distance (in meters) that other players's characters can be at for their dialogues to be auto-listened to, if "Auto-Listen Dialogues" is enabled.
h5efb42cag481bg466dg9089g55793976612a.TranslatedText: 自动倾听其他玩家角色对话的最大距离，需要先启用"自动倾听对话"

haa1fa94dg26f6g4de2g9aa5g3223510da178.ReferenceText: If enabled, a notification will be shown when characters controlled by other players join dialogues, to make them harder to miss.
haa1fa94dg26f6g4de2g9aa5g3223510da178.TranslatedText: 启用后, 会通告队友参与对话聊天中, 这样不容易错过

ha6a00a9ag10b2g4ac0g9be8gfc8bac919cf1.ReferenceText: If enabled, your character will automatically listen in on dialogues that other players enter, if they are within the range limit.
ha6a00a9ag10b2g4ac0g9be8gfc8bac919cf1.TranslatedText: 启用后，会自动倾听一定范围内其他玩家开启的对话

h5a1af856ge6bbg46b0g8c00g98c676f04629.ReferenceText:
We don't have that dye!
We shall shop for them at miscellaneous vendors.
h5a1af856ge6bbg46b0g8c00g98c676f04629.TranslatedText:
我们没有这个染料!
染料可以从材料商人购买

h0e034a16gd835g46bcga5bfgd44c3f88a36e.TranslatedText: 巴西葡萄牙语翻译: Ferocidade

h5b1b94ebg3d90g47e5g8b29g9f75c0aa6cd6.ReferenceText: French translation by Bern', Drayander & Ostheboss

h4a3e28fag3595g4753gb507g4423068aeda8.ReferenceText: Some settings may require a reload for changes to apply. You'll be warned when this is the case.
h4a3e28fag3595g4753gb507g4423068aeda8.TranslatedText: 大多数选项需要存档然后读档才能生效

hdf91946ag8402g42ecgafc2g4f2a232b81ef.ReferenceText: Adds aggro information to the health bar when hovering over enemies: AI preferred/unpreferred/ignored tag, as well as taunt source/target(s).
hdf91946ag8402g42ecgafc2g4f2a232b81ef.TranslatedText: 指向角色时, 生命栏下方显示AI仇恨信息: AI重视/轻视/无视, 还会显示嘲讽来源/目标

h3eb881efg123fg449bg9718g65ba0891f5bc.ReferenceText:
Adds improvements to the combat log: custom filters (accessible through right-click), merging messages, and slight rewording to improve consistency.
You must reload the save after making changes to this setting.
h3eb881efg123fg449bg9718g65ba0891f5bc.TranslatedText:
优化战斗记录: 自定义过滤器(右键打开), 合并信息, 措辞优化
该设置必须存档, 然后读档才生效

h86c94636gb954g4e3dg9679g477c7f889bb3.ReferenceText: Allow walking to corpses in combat
h86c94636gb954g4e3dg9679g477c7f889bb3.TranslatedText: 允许战斗中走到尸体上

h8945fbb1g7db8g42a8ga6c5g8db176a633ee.ReferenceText: Allows you to check all your equipped items while in the quest rewards UI.
h8945fbb1g7db8g42a8ga6c5g8db176a633ee.TranslatedText: 在弹出物品奖励页面时, 开启角色装备面板

hf61f1a35g7ee7g4b79g8728g9a278d2522b0.TranslatedText: 区域转移标签持续时间

h5bef00c6g36deg4db0ga3d5gb006dbc5f601.TranslatedText: 自动解锁背包 (多人模式)

he0bb8817g7c40g4572g9170gce3d351dc753.ReferenceText:
Automatically and instantly identify items whenever they are generated.
'With enough Loremaster' uses the highest Loremaster of all player characters, regardless of party.
he0bb8817g7c40g4572g9170gce3d351dc753.TranslatedText:
自动并立刻鉴定获得的物品
选择 '足够的博学' 则是由队伍中博学最高的队员来自动鉴定

hb74bc767gb91ag4a4cg9d9cg4c574397046c.ReferenceText: Causes EpicEncounters.IsLoaded() call to return false even if EE Core is enabled.
hb74bc767gb91ag4a4cg9d9cg4c574397046c.TranslatedText: 原因是调用EpicEncounters.IsLoaded() 返回false, 即使启用了EE Core

h351cdabfg577fg45e8gbe9dg6a513e599d13.ReferenceText:
Changes the duration of the label that appears at the top of the screen when you change areas. Set to 0 to disable them entirely.

Default is 5 seconds.
h351cdabfg577fg45e8gbe9dg6a513e599d13.TranslatedText:
所在区域改变时, 弹出的提示的持续时间. 设置0为禁止显示

默认5秒

h4bd4b3d7gf239g412dgb4e9g3421524ff330.ReferenceText: Changes the loading screen into a family photoshoot!
h4bd4b3d7gf239g412dgb4e9g3421524ff330.TranslatedText: 载入界面变为一张家庭照片!

h063ae4cag4291g4352g88c4gefad4a2e9fe4.ReferenceText: Controls the behaviour of the hotbar custom buttons area. 'Automatic' will cause it to switch between the single-row and dual-row layouts based on how many slot rows you have visible. Other settings will make it stick to one layout.
h063ae4cag4291g4352g88c4gefad4a2e9fe4.TranslatedText: 快捷栏左侧的按钮栏行数.  选择 '自动' 会随快捷栏扩充至最多2行, 或缩减至1行. 其他选项会固定1行或2行

h262d04a1g16d3g4dabg8f01gd68a6b25efc7.ReferenceText: Controls the default position of the Examine menu when it is opened.

hb8f2e390g2811g4df4gb9fdg3661092ef520.ReferenceText:
Controls the delay for simple tooltips to appear while hovering over objects in the world.

Default is 0.5s.
hb8f2e390g2811g4df4gb9fdg3661092ef520.TranslatedText:
指向物体时, 提示显示前的延迟时间

默认0.5秒

hb62c4354g1648g4f0eg83e9g4c2783e5fc86.ReferenceText:
Controls the opacity of your character portraits's status bars in combat. Hovering over the statuses will always display them at full opacity.

Default is 1.
hb62c4354g1648g4f0eg83e9g4c2783e5fc86.TranslatedText: 战斗中角色肖像旁边的状态栏透明度. 指向状态时会永远保持不透明.

hb53a9902g6a6fg4885ga47cg4329d6de565d.ReferenceText:
Controls the size of damage overheads.

Default is 24.
hb53a9902g6a6fg4885ga47cg4329d6de565d.TranslatedText:
头顶伤害文本字号

默认24

h17cf934dg824dg4400g8380g495e3bef019d.ReferenceText:
Controls the size of regular text above characters talking.

Default is 19.
h17cf934dg824dg4400g8380g495e3bef019d.TranslatedText:
显示在角色头上的普通文本字号

默认是19

hca79eaccgc9c9g4a87g9f9egdbfa57800a5a.ReferenceText: Controls whether notifications for characters casting skills show up in combat.
hca79eaccgc9c9g4a87g9f9egdbfa57800a5a.TranslatedText: 战斗中是否显示角色释放技能的通告

h6e1d16e8g4adbg4df0g9169g2ceed7a9a8a1.ReferenceText: Controls whether notifications for receiving items show.
h6e1d16e8g4adbg4df0g9169g2ceed7a9a8a1.TranslatedText: 显示获得物品时, 弹出的通告

hf3f1fedfg8c70g4342g95d7g64f3280f310a.ReferenceText: Controls whether notifications for sharing stats (Loremaster, Lucky Charm) show.
hf3f1fedfg8c70g4342g95d7g64f3280f310a.TranslatedText: 显示状态分享的通告, 比如分享了调查敌人时分享的博学, 搜东西时分享的幸运

h60bebbb6g771fg4fe8g8658g4b01db6b2d87.ReferenceText: Controls whether tooltips are shown for empty containers and bodies.
h60bebbb6g771fg4fe8g8658g4b01db6b2d87.TranslatedText: 环境提示会显示空容器和空尸体

h454a0cb5ga2edg439cga8fdg9dde0686c731.ReferenceText: Determines sorting in the save/load UI, if improvements for it are enabled.
h454a0cb5ga2edg439cga8fdg9dde0686c731.TranslatedText: 存档的排序规则, 前提打开了保存/载入界面优化

h1afda15cgc951g46e6g8aa6g333bc56665ae.ReferenceText: Determines the default tab for the crafting UI.
h1afda15cgc951g46e6g8aa6g333bc56665ae.TranslatedText: 制造面板的默认显示页面

h2c6440beg71c6g45c3g8a8bg9f6c64454faf.ReferenceText: Determines the language to use for Epip's features. Can be different than the language the game is running in.
h2c6440beg71c6g45c3g8a8bg9f6c64454faf.TranslatedText:
将Epip语言调整为非游戏所用语言
如果当前语言有问题的话

hd0e2b5b7geca4g4a5dgad60g1893680e319a.TranslatedText: 施法时禁用快捷栏槽位

h49611d79g2ae8g47dcgb20bge13634676cad.ReferenceText: Disables looting corpses in combat, unless shift is held. This allows you to easily move to their position.
h49611d79g2ae8g47dcgb20bge13634676cad.TranslatedText: 禁用战斗搜尸, 除非按住shift. 这样允许你轻松走到尸体位置上

h3da94ae0ge613g4331gb629gb467b74f7ca4.ReferenceText: Disables the hotbar slots while a spell is being cast.
h3da94ae0ge613g4331gb629gb467b74f7ca4.TranslatedText: 在施放法术时禁用快捷键槽位

h2ce0c9f6gc6b1g4191g9901g7383f9dbe3ef.TranslatedText: 玩家肖像显示重创/蹂躏

h39e2d175g348eg4697g93a5gf28a9544e4ba.ReferenceText: Emphasizes consumable items in world tooltips.
h39e2d175g348eg4697g93a5gf28a9544e4ba.TranslatedText: 在环境提示中, 高亮显示消耗品

he759cd00g404dg4731gb2a6g0ece913a327e.ReferenceText: Emphasizes container items in world tooltips.
he759cd00g404dg4731gb2a6g0ece913a327e.TranslatedText: 在环境提示中, 高亮显示容器

hb461a9b1g4866g4bbdgb046gd478f7368fab.ReferenceText: Emphasizes equipment items in world tooltips.
hb461a9b1g4866g4bbdgb046gd478f7368fab.TranslatedText: 在环境提示中, 高亮显示装备

hf7dbc203g640cg4c40g8fd3gdd2cf3545672.ReferenceText: Enables a UI widget that displays framerate, server tickrate, and mod versions.
hf7dbc203g640cg4c40g8fd3gdd2cf3545672.TranslatedText: 启用显示帧率, 服务器时钟频率和mod版本

hb7ac349eg981eg4bdega605g533f9a7bea9c.ReferenceText: Enables alternative sorting for the save/load UI, as well as searching.
hb7ac349eg981eg4bdega605g533f9a7bea9c.TranslatedText: 启用保存/载入界面的存档排序, 也适用于搜索中

h3a72d579gc132g43d8gb6f0g097bfdbf76fb.TranslatedText: 强制使用故事模式修复

hfd959b44gc01bg403eg95ebg5b17cd08d1ff.ReferenceText: Forces story patching on every session load.
hfd959b44gc01bg403eg95ebg5b17cd08d1ff.TranslatedText: 每次加载场景时, 强制使用故事模式修复

h7fe5f99dgae97g4586ga824g457d7c1322b5.ReferenceText: Gives characters practically infinite carry weight.
h7fe5f99dgae97g4586ga824g457d7c1322b5.TranslatedText: 给予角色几乎无限的负重

h00aa4e07g8833g4040g9355g6bed488f1237.ReferenceText: Host-only setting. Toggles Fog of War, which hides unexplored areas. This setting applies to all players in the server and is non-destructive; re-enabling it will restore FoW to normal, and all your exploration progress with the setting off will apply.
h00aa4e07g8833g4040g9355g6bed488f1237.TranslatedText: 主机设置, 该设置对所有客机一同生效. 开启战争迷雾会隐藏未探索区域. 关闭后再启用会将战争迷雾区域重置回关闭前的范围

ha13d577fg043ag4324g8d55gd5f2ba85efac.ReferenceText: If enabled, Battered and Harried stacks will be shown beside player portraits on the left interface.
ha13d577fg043ag4324g8d55gd5f2ba85efac.TranslatedText: 启用后, 玩家角色肖像左侧会显示重创和蹂躏层数

ha1146687g9261g49d4gad63g0269559fce2d.ReferenceText: If enabled, chairs, ladders and beds will show world tooltips. Requires "Enable tooltips for all items" to be enabled, as these do not have tooltips by default.
ha1146687g9261g49d4gad63g0269559fce2d.TranslatedText: 启用后, 环境提示中会显示椅子, 梯子和床. 需要启用 '显示所有物品' , 因为默认不会显示这类物品

hae703884g68c4g44d1gb1d2g211f87e7309c.ReferenceText: If enabled, clicking world tooltips will open containers rather than picking them up.
hae703884g68c4g44d1gb1d2g211f87e7309c.TranslatedText: 启用后, 点击环境提示会打开容器而不是捡起来

h868a6168gd10eg4340gb5f4gb35dc338c453.ReferenceText: If enabled, doors will show world tooltips. Requires "Enable tooltips for all items" to be enabled, as these do not have tooltips by default.
h868a6168gd10eg4340gb5f4gb35dc338c453.TranslatedText: 开启后, 环境提示中会显示门. 需要启用 '显示所有物品' , 因为默认不会显示这类物品

h0023bed4gd590g4375g80dcgf1e135f30b1e.ReferenceText: If enabled, items with no use actions will show world tooltips.
h0023bed4gd590g4375g80dcgf1e135f30b1e.TranslatedText: 启用后, 开启环境提示时, 会显示无法使用的物品

h28a24072g481eg4d1fgaac8gfacbe5243bdb.ReferenceText: If enabled, the Escape key will close EE UIs rather than turning back a page.
h28a24072g481eg4d1fgaac8gfacbe5243bdb.TranslatedText: 启用后, ESC键会关闭Epic Encounters的页面而不是返回前一页面

hca849069g389dg4bb0g8b59g40ea8b48c2db.ReferenceText:
If enabled, world tooltips will be shown for all items.
This includes clutter like doors, which you may filter out through the other world tooltip settings.
hca849069g389dg4bb0g8b59g40ea8b48c2db.TranslatedText:
启用后, 所以物品都会显示环境提示.
包括门以内的杂物, 可以通过设置过滤一些环境提示.

h09f0f7e8gb224g4018g9301g1cf150d5bc20.ReferenceText: If enabled, your characters's inventories in multiplayer will be automatically unlocked after a reload.
h09f0f7e8gb224g4018g9301g1cf150d5bc20.TranslatedText: 启用后, 多人模式下, 角色背包将会自动解锁

he1ba8777g2269g40b6gb21cg353aea79fb9b.ReferenceText: Logs AI scoring to the console.

h832b19aege182g49acgb536gfa969d7669b3.ReferenceText:
Multiplies the duration of status overheads.

Default is 1.
h832b19aege182g49acgb536gfa969d7669b3.TranslatedText:
在角色头上显示的状态文本 持续时间倍数

默认1

ha1fb1fb3g2796g4850gbdb0g727186aa7f71.ReferenceText: Out of season April Fools jokes

h37fadbc1g48acg4963gb243gd517a74d58b3.TranslatedText: 头顶状态持续时间倍数

hce85d2d7g4957g4a29g8962gb4d42f693e1a.ReferenceText: Plays a sound effect when a message is received, so as to make it easier to notice.
hce85d2d7g4957g4a29g8962gb4d42f693e1a.TranslatedText: 收到信息时, 播放一段声音, 避免玩家没注意到

h21723370gb5acg4f7bg8628g6b7b3249808c.ReferenceText: Show Character Sheet in reward UI
h21723370gb5acg4f7bg8628g6b7b3249808c.TranslatedText: 物品奖励页面可以检查装备

haa0cd7a5g5950g4cceg8fe0gd343fc6db5e0.TranslatedText: 显示椅子, 梯子和床

h854a85fegf878g45a3g98b6g0fff3d5496b7.ReferenceText: Show items with no use actions

h058cdfb5g6b63g486bg9e05g413c1cf64d4a.ReferenceText: Shows the Mastery button. If disabled, it remains accessible through hotbar actions.
h058cdfb5g6b63g486bg9e05g413c1cf64d4a.TranslatedText: 显示武器拓展mod的专精按钮. 关闭后, 依然可以通过快捷栏使用

h8e644d3dg9c33g4251g9674g48555ee9573b.ReferenceText:
Shows the combat log button on the right side of the hotbar.
If disabled, you can still toggle the combat log through hotbar actions.
h8e644d3dg9c33g4251g9674g48555ee9573b.TranslatedText:
战斗日志按钮放在快捷栏右边
禁用后, 你依然可以使用快捷栏按钮打开战斗日志

hcda03853g5322g48e6gb8d2g37a87a295fef.ReferenceText: Shows the keyboard hotkeys for custom actions.
hcda03853g5322g48e6gb8d2g37a87a295fef.TranslatedText: 显示快捷栏按钮的快捷键 (在控制->EPIP ENCOUNTERS中设置)

h7c2f8512g3c4eg4dffg946aga4482de181ae.ReferenceText: Toggles visibility of the minimap UI element.

h315ae29bg868cg4eceg8cc6gebc6623df369.TranslatedText: 发送消息后转移输入焦点

h16a650aegefdeg4a47g8abbg044995f9147c.ReferenceText: Unfocuses the UI after you send a message, restoring input to the rest of the game.
h16a650aegefdeg4a47g8abbg044995f9147c.TranslatedText: 发送聊天消息后, 输入焦点自动转移到游戏中

h1563a7b9g0998g4e06g82eag75097d9a7b79.TranslatedText: 调整摄像机间距敏感度

h991ec3d1g0162g4b29g8778gc986b7e3be6d.ReferenceText: Determines how rapidly the camera pitch changes as you move the mouse with the "Adjust Camera Pitch" keybind active.
h991ec3d1g0162g4b29g8778gc986b7e3be6d.TranslatedText: 当鼠标移动时, 调整摄像机间距的速度

h5484362egdb21g4770g8261g9317f2c365c7.ReferenceText: If enabled, moving the mouse down while the "Adjust Camera Pitch" keybind is active will decrease the pitch instead of increasing it.
h5484362egdb21g4770g8261g9317f2c365c7.TranslatedText: 启用后, 调整摄像机间距时, 下移鼠标会减少间距

h6902de2eg38f8g4893ga0feged6f278f7ffa.ReferenceText: If enabled, the "Adjust Camera Pitch" keybind will not be able to lower the pitch below a certain threshold, reducing the likelihood of the camera clipping through the ground while using it.
h6902de2eg38f8g4893ga0feged6f278f7ffa.TranslatedText: 启用后, 调整摄像机间距, 有最低值

hfbdd1288g3c74g4d2cgb072gceee4bf1f9a0.ReferenceText:
While held, vertical mouse movement will adjust the pitch (vertical angle) of the game camera.

Does not affect your default camera angle settings and any changes to the angle from the keybind will not persist across sessions.
hfbdd1288g3c74g4d2cgb072gceee4bf1f9a0.TranslatedText:
按住时, 垂直鼠标移动将调整游戏摄像机的角度.

不会影响默认摄像机角度设置, 并且按键对角度的任何更改都不会在不同游戏战役中保留

h9f74c097g9888g4f33gb296gd6286d108329.ReferenceText: If enabled, hovering over empty slots in the container inventory UI will highlight them. This setting is purely cosmetic, and is intended to make the container UI consistent with how the party inventory UI behaves.
h9f74c097g9888g4f33gb296gd6286d108329.TranslatedText: 启用后，将突出显示鼠标悬停的容器空槽。这个设置是纯粹装饰性的，目的是使容器UI与队伍背包UI的一致。

hd8218bb5gcf00g4051g90f2g05388601ab51.ReferenceText: Determines the default tab for the crafting UI.
hd8218bb5gcf00g4051g90f2g05388601ab51.TranslatedText: 决定合成面板默认显示的页面

h08dbc3efgf409g4a96g9d3bge907e2638a9a.ReferenceText:
Controls your Discord Rich Presence.

- Vanilla: unmodified; shows current map name and multiplayer status.
- Overhaul: displays the major overhaul being used (ex. "Epic Encounters 2") and party level.
- Custom: allows you to freely set both lines using the text boxes below.
h08dbc3efgf409g4a96g9d3bge907e2638a9a.TranslatedText:
显示Discord 游戏状态.

- 原版: 未修改; 显示当前地图名和多人状态.
- 覆盖: 显示主要使用的模组和队伍等级.
- 自定义: 允许自由设置自定义行.

h3a4e8fc6ga604g45f6gbff7g549e349fbe7d.ReferenceText: Rich Presence message to be used if the Rich Presence setting is set to "Custom".
h3a4e8fc6ga604g45f6gbff7g549e349fbe7d.TranslatedText: 自定义'时显示的Discord 游戏状态信息

hedbf4e2fgb8e6g400cgb08bgd33f99bc101d.ReferenceText: Controls how character levels are displayed in the health bar UI.
hedbf4e2fgb8e6g400cgb08bgd33f99bc101d.TranslatedText: 在生命栏附近显示角色等级

h71cef3e3g71bag4da1gb743g56dc62daf7ac.ReferenceText:
Controls how resistances are shown in the health bar UI.

- Never: resistances are never shown under the health bar.
- Only non-zero: only resistances that are not at 0 are displayed.
- If any non-zero: all resistances are displayed if the character has a non-zero amount of any of them; otherwise none are shown.
- Always: all resistances are shown.
h71cef3e3g71bag4da1gb743g56dc62daf7ac.TranslatedText:
如何在血条UI显示抗性.

- 从不: 不显示抗性.
- 只有非零: 只显示不为0的抗性.
- 任意非零: 只要角色有抗性不为0, 就显示全部抗性, 否则全部隐藏.
- 总是: 一直显示所有抗性.

hf7564e88g6db5g4f04g9471g668f0f2902a1.TranslatedText: 显示不兼容史诗遭遇的官方mod

h1608e07agf046g4d0dg8298gcfd263df903e.TranslatedText: 允许拖拽未学习的技能

h3be3b775gcd1ag4340g8bb2g53aff8a65aaa.ReferenceText: If enabled, holding shift, ctrl, alt or GUI while using keybinds for slots will attempt to use slots from the 2nd, 3rd, 4th and 5th visible bars respectively.
h3be3b775gcd1ag4340g8bb2g53aff8a65aaa.TranslatedText: 启用后，按住shift，ctrl，alt或者GUI，可以使用2号，3号，4号 或5号快捷栏上的技能，物品等

hfcebd9e1g7fa9g4176g81b4g7cb089ba65ba.ReferenceText:
If enabled, you will be able to drag skills the character doesn't know onto the hotbar.
This does not allow the skills to be used, but is useful for creating placeholders.
hfcebd9e1g7fa9g4176g81b4g7cb089ba65ba.TranslatedText: 启用后, 你可以拖拽角色不知道的技能到快捷栏上

had42db79gf12cg4376g970bg0b9e0276a5d2.ReferenceText: Select upper bars with modifier keys
had42db79gf12cg4376g970bg0b9e0276a5d2.TranslatedText: 使用快捷键选择其他快捷栏的选项

h92f5ec36g9d74g4eccg951eg9d9620dda934.ReferenceText: If enabled, the Quick Examine UI will show the equipped artifacts of characters.
h92f5ec36g9d74g4eccg951eg9d9620dda934.TranslatedText: 启用后, 快速检查UI会显示角色身上的已装备神器

h405ae4b4g1499g463fgbe98ge384c0eaac2e.ReferenceText: Determines the order in which equipment slots are shown in Quick Examine's equipment widget.
h405ae4b4g1499g463fgbe98ge384c0eaac2e.TranslatedText: 决定快速检查UI里, 装备槽的显示优先级

h130006d8gccb5g4164g87aeged4685812627.ReferenceText: If enabled, the Quick Examine UI will show the equipped items of player characters.
h130006d8gccb5g4164g87aeged4685812627.TranslatedText: 启用后, 快速检查UI会显示玩家角色的已装备物品

h41f3c758g87e9g4caegb1eeg5e324bd1564a.ReferenceText: If enabled, the Quick Examine UI will show the skills of player characters and their cooldowns.
h41f3c758g87e9g4caegb1eeg5e324bd1564a.TranslatedText: 启用后, 快速检查UI会显示角色身上的技能和冷却

h70e80784gadb9g4d5agae96gc219142a7d43.ReferenceText: If enabled, the Quick Examine UI will show the active and visible statuses of characters.
h70e80784gadb9g4d5agae96gc219142a7d43.TranslatedText: 启用后, 快速检查UI会显示角色身上的可见状态

h9d0d399dg626eg48f9ga7cag91bc0899906d.ReferenceText:
Determines the amount of action points between which a larger divider graphic is shown on the AP bar. May help with readability of remaining "actions".

Set to '20' to effectively disable them.
h9d0d399dg626eg48f9ga7cag91bc0899906d.TranslatedText:
决定分隔一次有多少行动点, 方便计算行动点.

设置成 '20' 会禁用该设置

h2bbdd581g5f42g436fgafbbg923568599545.ReferenceText: Creates a surface at the cursor's world position, if the Surface Painter UI is open.
h2bbdd581g5f42g436fgafbbg923568599545.TranslatedText: 在鼠标位置创建一片地表, 需要先打开地表画画UI

h2f7ed974g4184g404fga2abg640d32f6f7aa.ReferenceText:
Controls the position of item tooltips within the Party Inventory and Container Inventory UIs.

- Near cursor: vanilla behaviour; tooltips appear near the cursor.
- On UI sides: tooltips will be positioned on the left side of the source UI if possible, or on the right otherwise.
h2f7ed974g4184g404fga2abg640d32f6f7aa.TranslatedText:
背包和容器物品提示显示的位置.

- 指针附近: 同原版, 提示显示在指针附近.
-界面边缘: 提示会显示在界面左边或右边.

hbed9b7bcgbbebg428cgbbf2g566a6033f281.ReferenceText:
Controls the delay in seconds before item comparison tooltips are shown. This delay is additive with the "Inventory Item Tooltip Delay" setting.

Default value is %s seconds.
hbed9b7bcgbbebg428cgbbf2g566a6033f281.TranslatedText:
物品比较提示显示前的延迟. 该延迟和"背包物品提示延迟"叠加.

默认值为 %s 秒.

he421bb33gea54g44b3ga90bg5fff2fae3383.ReferenceText: Controls the delay in seconds before item tooltips display upon hovering over items in the Party Inventory and Container Inventory UIs.
he421bb33gea54g44b3ga90bg5fff2fae3383.TranslatedText: 指向背包和容器中的物品时, 物品提示显示前的延迟

h4025c1c4g6527g4b6ag8369g49c0b1949dea.ReferenceText:
If enabled, the positions of the following UIs will be remembered across sessions:
- Character Sheet
- Party Inventory
- Quick Find
- Quick Loot

h92547755gb161g4e13gbd37ga31d5101d177.ReferenceText: Displays certain common character flags in the health bar while holding shift, such as attack of opportunity availability. Works best on player characters and updating certain flags might be delayed.
h92547755gb161g4e13gbd37ga31d5101d177.TranslatedText: 鼠标悬停角色且按住shift时, 在生命栏处显示特定常见角色标记. 比如 可用借机攻击. 在玩家角色上效果明显, 部分标记刷新可能会有延迟

h8db61443g39bfg45f1g8c0cga6ab56bb12b7.ReferenceText: Open Generic UI Texture Test UI

heb8e464cg6305g46aeg8fbag240af8560ebe.ReferenceText: Release left-click to Greatforge this item.
heb8e464cg6305g46aeg8fbag240af8560ebe.TranslatedText: 释放左键, 让伟大熔炉锻造该物品

h3a1fa582g7217g4722gbcc5gc835c482d94a.ReferenceText:
Carve a name onto the item to signify the special bond between yourself and it.
Purely cosmetic.
h3a1fa582g7217g4722gbcc5gc835c482d94a.TranslatedText:
在物品上刻上名字, 表显示你和它之间的特殊联系
只是装饰

hac06b15egc508g40b1gb729gf0951d875d5f.ReferenceText: We do not have a bedroll to rest on!

h8f6b67aaga9fag4c62gbd92g0f4d43fd8855.ReferenceText: Hides the Hotbar and Minimap while within the Ascension and Greatforge UIs.
h8f6b67aaga9fag4c62gbd92g0f4d43fd8855.TranslatedText: 打开飞升和伟大熔炉页面时, 隐藏快捷栏和小地图

h9f6cbb29ge1f5g4b74g9e19ge7a83138bbf5.ReferenceText: Mod '%s' is incompatible with '%s' and it is not recommended to use them together.
h9f6cbb29ge1f5g4b74g9e19ge7a83138bbf5.TranslatedText: Mod '%s' 与 '%s' 冲突, 不推荐一起使用

h9582c7b8geff7g40cbg9276g6afac3ab2ee3.ReferenceText:
If enabled, multi-select controls will be available for the party inventory UI.

Use Ctrl+Click to select/deselect items. If at least one item is selected, Shift+Click will select a range of items.

Right-click selected items to access a context menu with operations, or drag and drop them to inventory slots, player inventory tabs, or container items to move them.
h9582c7b8geff7g40cbg9276g6afac3ab2ee3.TranslatedText: 启用后, 可以在队伍背包中多选物品

h4a828b3egc70fg4ce9g8d81gd46b307b9366.ReferenceText: Selects a range of items starting from the first selected item and ending with the hovered one, if 'Multi-Select controls' are enabled and at least one item is selected.
h4a828b3egc70fg4ce9g8d81gd46b307b9366.TranslatedText: 选择从第一个选定物品和指向的物品之间的一系列物品。需要启用“多选物品”并且至少选择了一个物品。

h8af4098fga9b6g4981g8338g8c4008d54f8a.ReferenceText: Toggles multi-select on the hovered item, if 'Multi-select controls' are enabled.
h8af4098fga9b6g4981g8338g8c4008d54f8a.TranslatedText: 开启指向物品的多选，需要先启用“多选物品”

hccad2bc4g7010g48e3gae5dg045ab5228de2.ReferenceText:
Controls the height of the user interface.

Default is 600.

h3985c604gd7a2g4e68gb817g4d1311259a13.ReferenceText:
Controls the opacity of the background panel.

Default is 80%.

h4f610121gdb42g4d2fg9a8ag61eeedb018cb.ReferenceText:
Controls the width of the user interface.

Default is 400.

h9e8f2aecg2b81g4f48ga9bbg43dd8f593686.ReferenceText: Saves the UI's current position and restores it upon reloading. Use to set the default position of the UI.
h9e8f2aecg2b81g4f48ga9bbg43dd8f593686.TranslatedText: 保存UI当前位置, 读档后恢复. 目的是设置UI默认位置

h1d691e43g71beg469ag8795g8f6fdf95be62.ReferenceText: Close UI after using an item

h54323161g125cg4289gb934g2d9fc803c92c.ReferenceText:
Filters items by stat boost, such as attribute or ability boosts.
Ex. 'Summoning' will show items that increase the Summoning ability. Queries need not be whole words.
h54323161g125cg4289gb934g2d9fc803c92c.TranslatedText:
按属性增强过滤物品, 例如属性或技能提增强.
例如, "召唤学派” 将显示增加召唤学派的物品. 查询关键词可以用不完整的单词

h13d1cd67ga1e8g4d7cg813bg3c01187b10ce.ReferenceText: If enabled, books that have been read and keys that have been used will be shown.
h13d1cd67ga1e8g4d7cg813bg3c01187b10ce.TranslatedText: 启用后, 阅读过的书籍和使用过的钥匙会被标识出来

h39e10fefg8a83g4390gad94g1dc051c2f943.ReferenceText: If enabled, containers with no items will shown.

h05a441a6gbe67g46adg9053g4e553bbf229c.ReferenceText: If enabled, items marked as wares will be shown.
h05a441a6gbe67g46adg9053g4e553bbf229c.TranslatedText: 启用后, 显示标记为待售品的物品

hda7ece02g6e5dg41a7gb4f7g62de6a4b3c1f.ReferenceText:
If enabled, items will also be searched recursively within containers.
%s
hda7ece02g6e5dg41a7gb4f7g62de6a4b3c1f.TranslatedText:
启用后， 递归搜索容器中的物品。
%s

h8b035113g39eag49e6gae13g9a1de5375471.ReferenceText: If enabled, the UI will be closed if you click anything in the world.
h8b035113g39eag49e6gae13g9a1de5375471.TranslatedText: 启用后, 如果在游戏世界任意点击, 会关闭页面

h8de93e20gae0dg45cfg9695g478ba659f71a.ReferenceText:
If enabled, the UI will close after using an item.

You can hold shift while clicking an item to temporarily invert this setting.
h8de93e20gae0dg45cfg9695g478ba659f71a.TranslatedText: 启用后, 使用物品后会关闭页面

h6232b543g92dag4b65gac80g0d3f7e833f72.ReferenceText: Quick Find is a UI that shows a customizable filtered view of the party inventory, opened using Ctrl+F by default.
h6232b543g92dag4b65gac80g0d3f7e833f72.TranslatedText: 快速搜索可以过滤并显示队伍背包的物品. 默认按Ctrl+F打开快速搜索面板

h489ece91g926dg48dfg85e7g7802206d217a.ReferenceText: One or more of the settings changed require the game to be saved and reloaded to take effect.
h489ece91g926dg48dfg85e7g7802206d217a.TranslatedText: 有设置需要保存并读档, 来生效

hb1f871fbg6572g4325gbd1fgebd218bf97a9.ReferenceText: You have unsaved changes. Do you wish to apply them?
hb1f871fbg6572g4325gbd1fgebd218bf97a9.TranslatedText: 你有未保存的修改? 你希望这些修改生效吗?

h0d296a7dgd716g475agb4c6g9b3de417c79f.ReferenceText: Replaces the status bar by your characters's portraits with a custom UI that enables various sorting and filtering options.
h0d296a7dgd716g475agb4c6g9b3de417c79f.TranslatedText: 用自定义UI替换角色肖像的状态容器。

h4c594766g0190g4016gb7a5g0b99c3e2011a.ReferenceText: Sets the sorting order for statuses. Statuses with a higher priority show in the left-most position, statuses with a lower priority show in the right-most position.
h4c594766g0190g4016gb7a5g0b99c3e2011a.TranslatedText: 设置状态排序顺序. 高优先级的状态会显示在最左边的位置, 最低优先级则在最右边.

hb9e14744g4868g4e08gb3d7ga9bd57629d03.ReferenceText:
Shows the Battered/Harries statuses while Alternative Status Display is enabled.
If you disable this, it is recommended to enable the B/H display on the portraits.
hb9e14744g4868g4e08gb3d7ga9bd57629d03.TranslatedText:
显示可选状态启用后, 显示重创和蹂躏状态
如果你禁用了本选项, 推荐启用角色肖像显示重创和蹂躏状态的选项

h4b67c715g0d30g4015gba18ge8ea4f357448.ReferenceText: Shows the Source Generation status while Alternative Status Display is enabled.
h4b67c715g0d30g4015gba18ge8ea4f357448.TranslatedText: 显示可选状态启用后, 显示秘源再生状态

hca56dcd2gf7f6g4662g94cfga66262672545.ReferenceText: Statuses in this list will be filtered out and not shown in the status bar if "Alternative Status Display" is enabled. Holding shift temporarily disables this filter.
hca56dcd2gf7f6g4662g94cfga66262672545.TranslatedText: 该列表的状态会被过滤掉, 不会显示在状态栏上. 按住shift可以暂时禁用过滤

hdaeb81edg863bg492cgab09ged3a5d2470d7.ReferenceText: Using toggleable world tooltips requires binding the vanilla key for them.
hdaeb81edg863bg492cgab09ged3a5d2470d7.TranslatedText: 使用切换环境提示需要先绑定原版的显示环境提示按键

hba6d14b0gdbb9g4b00g8036ga14b329a1960.ReferenceText: If enabled, zone and cone-type skills will display the correct range if the character has %s.
hba6d14b0gdbb9g4b00g8036ga14b329a1960.TranslatedText: 启用后, 如果角色拥有%s, 射线以及扇形技能会正确地显示范围

h524c03d2g797cg4038g98d4gbc36024b7649.ReferenceText: Displays the names of the first few items in containers within their tooltips. Set to 0 to disable.
h524c03d2g797cg4038g98d4gbc36024b7649.TranslatedText: 在提示中，显示容器中前几个物品，设置成 0 可以禁用此功能

h420215fegeaecg4ccdg9e74gf68ed7bd72b9.ReferenceText: If enabled, item tooltips will show a hint if the item has been Masterworked.
h420215fegeaecg4ccdg9e74gf68ed7bd72b9.TranslatedText: 启用后, 物品提示会显示该物品是否是杰作

h176a0a5cgce9dg4cd7gbf2bg053624c85791.ReferenceText: If enabled, skill, item, status and custom tooltips will use an opaque background.
h176a0a5cgce9dg4cd7gbf2bg053624c85791.TranslatedText: 启用后，技能，物品，状态和自定义提示使用不透明背景

h8ed2ccd3g2e36g48bdg98dcg3cbf09c78464.ReferenceText: Combine with Pixie Dust to create a small rune of the respective material.
h8ed2ccd3g2e36g48bdg98dcg3cbf09c78464.TranslatedText: 和仙尘组合成材料对应的小型符文

hdd0f768aged04g4450g8259g62763d810f2f.ReferenceText:
If enabled, items whose only purpose is to be crafted into runes will display how to do so in their tooltip.
%s
hdd0f768aged04g4450g8259g62763d810f2f.TranslatedText:
启用后, 只能用来合成符文的材料会显示合成提示
%s

h6d7395dbgd11eg4fc2g8859gb3a903853b1c.ReferenceText: Damage scales only with character level.
h6d7395dbgd11eg4fc2g8859gb3a903853b1c.TranslatedText: 伤害只受到角色等级影响

ha0a0a085g359ag4f0dga54bgcf40d0f6af9d.ReferenceText: Display quest reward deltamod generation warning
ha0a0a085g359ag4f0dga54bgcf40d0f6af9d.TranslatedText: 显示任务奖励增强生成提醒

h3e92415fg1242g4d2dg8297g4f4ed3d3d413.ReferenceText: If enabled, increases the layer of the surface tooltip UI, which makes surface tooltips render over the hotbar instead of underneath it.
h3e92415fg1242g4d2dg8297g4f4ed3d3d413.TranslatedText: 启用后, 提高地表提示的UI显示层级, 也就是说地表提示不会被快捷栏挡住

h2095b033g942eg400agb596g45d9ba3294c7.ReferenceText: If enabled, status tooltips will show the name of the character that applied the status, if any. Also allows you to click statuses to center the camera on the source character.
h2095b033g942eg400agb596g45d9ba3294c7.TranslatedText: 启用后, 状态提示会显示来源角色的名字. 如果点击状态, 镜头会移动到来源角色上

h72d280e5gde61g49bdgbbdbg7c6e6eec9dde.ReferenceText:
If enabled, the quest rewards screen will warn about deltamod generation only occuring afterwards.
Applies only to EE.
h72d280e5gde61g49bdgbbdbg7c6e6eec9dde.TranslatedText:
启用后, 任务奖励窗口只会在发生后提醒增强生成
只适用于史诗遭遇mod

hcc271c27g1f31g42f9gafd3g989f2fc5dccd.TranslatedText: 提高地表提示的UI显示层级

h36b35885g9f60g40b1ga77fg0c501ab76654.ReferenceText: Modifiers are added after you choose your reward.

h979a8059g2ea7g436fg863bgf6b008ad3072.ReferenceText: Removes the redundant 'Set :' prefix that appears in deltamod names and rune effects.
h979a8059g2ea7g436fg863bgf6b008ad3072.TranslatedText: 删除出现在装备增强和符文效果中的冗余前缀'Set :'

h9cd1245egdfdeg4cbbgbae7gfa179a954eac.ReferenceText: If enabled, the health bar when you hover over characters and items will show their treasure table (if relevant) as well as the chance of getting an artifact. For characters, this requires holding the Show Sneak Cones key (shift by default)
h9cd1245egdfdeg4cbbgbae7gfa179a954eac.TranslatedText: 启用后, 指向角色和物品时, 生命栏下方会显示掉落物(如果可行). 指向角色时需要按住显示视野信息的按键 (默认是shift))

hcd9974f8g16cfg4cbfga08agbf28ee5b55eb.ReferenceText: Show loot drops in health bar

hc8131fa1g3bf9g4773gb244gcdf8b1b45f7c.ReferenceText: %s is an innate skill; it might be unwise to rid myself of it.
hc8131fa1g3bf9g4773gb244gcdf8b1b45f7c.TranslatedText: %s 是一个天赋技能，去除它可能并不明智

h663a33aeg894cg428eg8d9eg799a8bd07386.ReferenceText: Are you sure you want to unlearn %s?

hcc3ddb27g8770g4d1bg9964gb2387308d99c.ReferenceText: I cannot unlearn skills granted by external sources.
hcc3ddb27g8770g4d1bg9964gb2387308d99c.TranslatedText: 我无法遗忘来自外部的技能

hb931ea77g4e56g47c3g9a69g923b8f76482b.ReferenceText: I cannot unlearn skills that do not exist.
hb931ea77g4e56g47c3g9a69g923b8f76482b.TranslatedText: 我无法遗忘不存在的技能

h616fdab7g67c9g4db0g80f4gc04d25dc0e4e.ReferenceText: I cannot unlearn skills that take up no memory.
h616fdab7g67c9g4db0g80f4gc04d25dc0e4e.TranslatedText: 我不能遗忘不占用记忆的技能

h651ef6a9gf376g47b7gb230gb73521021f74.ReferenceText: I cannot unlearn skills while in combat.
h651ef6a9gf376g47b7gb230gb73521021f74.TranslatedText: 我无法在战斗遗忘技能

h9b5014e1gb9d4g4dc8g8c47g11f06fe3e576.ReferenceText: I would lose my special spark if I were to give that up.
h9b5014e1gb9d4g4dc8g8c47g11f06fe3e576.TranslatedText: 如果我放弃这个，我会失去特别充能

ha58ca030gdf7bg42ffga616gcda9d8f3b753.ReferenceText: Sourcery is an innate part of who I am; I cannot get rid of it.
ha58ca030gdf7bg42ffga616gcda9d8f3b753.TranslatedText: 秘源是我的一部分，无法去除

h0d38d9a9gd416g4815gabc7gf9d8d901d40a.ReferenceText: If enabled, light items such as torches, candles and braziers will show world tooltips.
h0d38d9a9gd416g4815gabc7gf9d8d901d40a.TranslatedText: 启用后, 环境提示中会显示光源物品, 比如火炬, 蜡烛, 火盆
